name: Puppy Land
description:
Known Issue!! If you reach the space section and die, the boss might not spawn on subsequent plays. You will have to refresh the page if this happens, sorry.

Hi, I'm Oscar! Help me find all my friends and give them big chomps to claim victory in the East vs. West popularity contest!

Built by Egemen Altunyay for Giantbomb.com's GiantRom4 game jam. Thanks to Giant Bomb and the GB community.
